# Simplified version code production

**Netizen demand:** How to delete unnecessary demos and make a simplified version  
**of the transformation plan:** The project provides many examples. If you donâ€™t need them, you can delete them. We provide deletion steps, please refer to the following.

## Demo sample code deleted

### Step 1: Change the personal center to the first level menu

```
UPDATE `sys_permission` SET `parent_id` = '',menu_type=0 WHERE `id` = '1438108188378521602';
```

copy

### Step 2: Change all demo menus to logical deletion

```
UPDATE sys_permission
SET del_flag = 1
WHERE
	id IN (
		'1438108187455774722',
		'1438108196993622018',
		'1438108221551271937',
		'1438108225451974658',
```

### Step 3: Delete the demo code

```
rd/s/q src\views\demo\feat\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\form\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\charts\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\codemirror\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\comp\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\editor\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\excel\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\fullcalendar\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\level\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\main-out\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\permission\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\setup\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\system\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\table\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\tree\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\page\desc\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\page\list\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\page\form\
rd/s/q src\views\demo\page\result\
rd/s/q src\views\report\

```

copy

## How to reduce dependencies

#### 1\. For example: remove Excel dependency`xlsx`

1.  Modify package.json and delete dependencies

```
"xlsx": "^0.17.3",
```

copy

> Note that the dependencies in this parameter must also be deleted

![](https://lfs.k.topthink.com/lfs/eb92664f34ba5e3ca700bbab951662ae224401e462965b2fa34b1b11c836bd20.dat)

2.  Delete the component and example source directories

```
src\components\Excel
src\views\demo\excel
```

copy

3.  Delete the example routing configuration

```
src\router\routes\modules\demo\feat.ts
```

copy

4.  Delete menu configuration  
    ![](https://lfs.k.topthink.com/lfs/e34692f5f14d6b02f70180a70ab19929ed8c1d687ac1988d61926b226a3e90e6.dat)

```
UPDATE sys_permission
SET del_flag = 1
WHERE
	id IN (
'1438108182116425729',
'1438108183219527682',
'1438108185660612609',
'1438108185815801858',
'1438108185958408193',
'1438108186289758209'
)
```

copy

---

#### 2\. Example: Deleting micro-frontend dependencies`qiankun`

1.  Removing dependencies  
    ![](https://lfs.k.topthink.com/lfs/df217e2f422a5a1489bc363d86c3bd331f1b75ec2cff563676b1568bb5098dbb.dat)
2.  Comment out the registration code

```
src\layouts\default\content\index.vue
```

copy

![](https://lfs.k.topthink.com/lfs/40382f9745ed72cbe47c9af7c612f4aaccdfeb38096f4182172733b2ded9d1ac.dat)  
3\. Comment out the implementation class (comment out all files in this directory) or delete this directory directly  
![](https://lfs.k.topthink.com/lfs/a4cdf51acfa24662123a2884c37478c5288525126bc9898cdd872bdce6305e55.dat)

#### 3\. More Dependency Removal and Streamlining

Refer to [the package dependency introduction](#!) and delete unnecessary components
